website_summaries.verdict: Another iteration given to the Adidas Superstar silhouette is presented on the Adidas Superstar Bounce Primeknit. This new version of the Adidas Superstar offers a comfortable, lightweight, and breathable feeling for the foot, making this low-top sneaker a good choice during hot weather.With its Primeknit upper, a wearer experiences a rather adaptive fit from the shoe. Offered in various colorways, though, not a budget-friendly price, one can still get a good deal out of this shoe.
pros: The Adidas Superstar Bounce Primeknit is a quite comfortable shoe as what a majority of the buyers who took time on giving reviews expressed
Some of the users claimed that the shoe feels lightweight
A breathable feeling is felt when wearing the shoe as what some of the reviewers claimed
The shoe looks really stylish as what a good number of reviewers stated
A couple of users were glad about the shoe being able to match their outfit picks
Several reviewers said that they receive a lot of compliments when wearing the shoe
One buyer stated that the shoe had exceeded his/her expectations
A good number of buyers expressed that they would definitely recommend the shoe
The shoe is offered in a variety of colorways for buyers to choose from
cons: A couple of users complained that the Adidas Superstar Bounce Primeknit has very long shoe laces
The shoe is sold at a slightly expensive price
A few of the buyers claimed that the shoe might run a bit large

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking comfortable shoe. Modern take on the classic.
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing. Would have been cool if they could have worked in the trademark stripes but they look super clean and stealth without them so. A little worried about stains getting on the fabric part. The woven material is legit. Flexible and breathable but also secure. The material gives the shoe kind of a rough carbon fiber tactical sports car vibe. Pulling the tongue straight is wierd, it’s like a single layer of really flexible woven fabric. They are all day casual comfort approved for me.
customer_reviews.author: Trashbag

customer_reviews.title: This Superstar Bounce is breathable and light.
customer_reviews.text: Today i realize i am superstar fan that buy 3 pair in 3 months.they are past, present, future.80' clean, bounce, 80' boost. Also they weigh like this:clean>boost>bounce.My location max temperature is 87 F, relatively hot. Two pairs of leather shoes will be a bit stuffy. Bounce is breathable and light compared to them. But the insole will shift. Ortholite insole is really breathable and dry. I hope adidas can be applied to all shoes, after all, the cost is not much.
customer_reviews.author: PengGQ

customer_reviews.title: This shoes are not for cold weather, they are knitted and therefore you will suffer in cold temperatures if you don't wear socks
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pair of shoes I have worn, in fact this is my second pair, it fits like a glove and it is extremely comfortable. If you wear them too long - As I generally do - I recommend changing the insoles for something with gel or similar as the normal ones will go bad eventually
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: ... the size bigger than other brands but still feel comfortable. I can say much as having used only ...
customer_reviews.text: somewhat the size bigger than other brands but still feel comfortable. I can say much as having used only one time.Need time to break the shoes and will update again soon
customer_reviews.author: whisnu

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, no problems with seller
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, no problems with seller. Only issues has been material gets dirty quick and dyes from jeans will stain the shoe itself. 4 stars for stain resistant quality of material. Otherwise very clean and light shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H.

customer_reviews.title: The material feels nice. The design is very sleek black
customer_reviews.text: The tip of the shoes are somewhat small in terms of height, so you can feel it pressing down on you. I'll give it some more time to break in before I update this review. The material feels nice. The design is very sleek black, so I like it. Overall I do not regret buying these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned! They clean up easily with a simply brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Whipkey

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet, and super breathable
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt sure what to expect with this kind of material on this shoe. I love Superstar 2's, but the Bungie material makes them incredibly comfortable for wide-feet (which I have).
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: Original evolved.
customer_reviews.text: Although I will always love my original shelltoes I have to admit the primeknit + bounce tweak is welcomed. Both design augments offer comfort in the sole as well as the body. Oh, btw the blue colorway is unique, bold and a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you buy PK's from superstar go 1/2 size lower. this one was too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy shoes. First Adidas pair I have ever owned and now I am hooked.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy material
customer_reviews.text: The material making up the shoe is stretchy so it fits a lot looser that you would expect
customer_reviews.author: Carlos E Fagan

customer_reviews.title: It's just amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love it! Its exactly what I wanted! The quality is very good and it fit as expected. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ROHAM

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but made a full size larger than stated.
customer_reviews.author: JetpackBlues

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Superstar Bounce Primeknit Sneaker
product_meta.description: One of the most popular and recognizable designs ever, the Adidas Superstar sneaker transcends sport and brings its singular style to the streets. These men's shoes have an Adidas Primeknit upper that hugs your foot.
